goals.active: Speak to Gairwen near Morgan's Spiral.
goals.complete: I traveled to Morgan's Spiral to meet Gairwen, Bercilak's current love interest. He killed her true love, and she hates him with a passion. After I helped defend her love's grave, she told me that Bercilak's armor made him powerful. To find out how, I will seek the armorsmith who forged it.
